body.p:
The State of Massachusetts
County of Suffolk, ss.

I, Benjamin H, Currier, duly appointed by the Governor of the State of Kentucky, a Commissioner of Deeds for said State of Kentucky resident at Boston in the State of Massachusetts, Do Solemnly Swear, that I will well and truly execute and perform all the duties of my station under and by virtue of the Laws of said State of Kentucky.

So help me God,
Benj, H, Currier

body.p: Subscribed and Sworn to, before me, at Boston, this first day of April A. D. 1862.

Jas B Robb
Justice of the Peace

Massachusetts
Oath --
Benj. H. Currier
Comr. of Deeds
Filed Apr. 7. 1862
